item.title: Rahel add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "We love the things we love for what they are." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Rahel add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Bill Keane
item.description: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present." -- Bill Keane

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Rahel add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Atheism turns out to be too simple. If the whole universe has no meaning, we should never have found out that it has no meaning..." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Mother Theresa
item.description: "I know God won't give me anything I can't handle. I just wish he didn't trust me so much." -- Mother Theresa

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rahel add a quote by dee
item.description: "Seindah apa pun huruf terukir, dapatkah ia bermakna apabila tak ada jeda? Dapatkan ia dimengerti jika tak ada spasi? Bukankah kita baru bisa bergerak jika ada jarak? Dan saling menyayang bila ada ruang?" -- dee

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Flavia
item.description: "Some people come into our lives and quickly go. Some stay for a while, leave footprints on our hearts, and we are never, ever the same." -- Flavia

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Flavia Weedn
item.description: "If one dream should fall and break into a thousand pieces, never be afraid to pick one of those pieces up and begin again." -- Flavia Weedn

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "Even for me life had its gleams of sunshine." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Peace begins with a smile.." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "God doesn't require us to succeed, he only requires that you try." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Never travel faster than your guardian angel can fly." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Rahel add a quote by Mother Theresa
item.description: "It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving." -- Mother Theresa
